source.name: Safety Measurement System (SMS) - Tool - SMS Front Page
source.description: The Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration's (FMCSA) Safety Management System (SMS) is an automated data system used by FMCSA to monitor motor carrier on-road safety performance. FMCSA analyzes safety performance by grouping carrier data in the SMS into seven Behavioral Analysis and Safety Improvement Categories (BASICs) which are, in turn, used to identify potential safety problems with individual carriers and determine when an enforcement intervention might be appropriate. The SMS Tool is hosted on the FMCSA Analysis and Information website, and is available to the public. Additional access to data is available for Federal and State enforcement personnel as well as to motor carriers to their own data via the FMCSA Portal.
